item.title: Portable Oxygen Dispensing Unit – (Large Bottle with Full Face Mask)

numlitem.para: "Cargo Aircraft Only" dangerous goods are not carried on board the aircraft.

note.para: Bottles not properly serviced are replaced, serviced, or removed at next available maintenance facility.

numlitem.para: "Cargo Aircraft Only" dangerous goods shipments requiring inflight accessibility are prohibited.
Remove the unserviceable unit from the aircraft and placard O2 bottle "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: "Cargo Aircraft Only" dangerous goods shipments requiring inflight accessibility are prohibited.
